segments.text: I met Mark yesterday . He looked blue .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He ’ s been on the gravy train these years , hasn ’ t he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It belongs to the past . He lost his job the other day , and he ’ s up a tree now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems that nobody can always expect things to pan out well each time .
segments.speaker: S2
